subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: In order to ride a steep face that received minimal sunlight, Jeremy Jones and Ryland Bell spent an evening nestled on a ledge thousands of feet above their base camp in Alaska’s Fairweather Range.
snippet: In order to ride a steep face that received minimal sunlight, Jeremy Jones and Ryland Bell spent an evening nestled on a ledge thousands of feet above their base camp in Alaska’s Fairweather Range.
